data.title: The National Cancer Society of Malaysia Sarawak Branch (NCSMSB)
data.meta_description: The National Cancer Society of Malaysia Sarawak Branch is a non-profit non-government organization established in 1986 in Kuching, Sarawak.
data.meta_site_name: The National Cancer Society of Malaysia Sarawak Branch
data.text:
The National Cancer Society of Malaysia Sarawak Branch (NCSMSB) is a non-profit non-government organization established in 1986 in Kuching, Sarawak. Our main activities are Palliative Home Care, Loan of Medical Equipment, Public Education/ Awareness and Training.

Palliative care is an approach that improves the quality of life of patients (adults and children) and their families who are facing problems associated with life-threatening illness. It prevents and relieves suffering through the early identification, correct assessment and treatment of pain and other problems, whether physical, psychosocial or spiritual.
